articles.author: Marvel
articles.title: Marvel Studios Remembers Robert Redford - Marvel.com
articles.description: The legendary actor shared his immense talents with us in 'Captain America: The Winter Soldier' and 'Avengers: Endgame.'
articles.content:
Marvel Studios is saddened to learn of the passing of Hollywood icon Robert Redford. A legendary performer and a champion of film, Redford passed away Sept. 16 at the age of 89.
